column2: FEATURED;Phnom Penh:------ According to preliminary reports
column4: in collaboration with the Russei Keo and Chamkarmon police
column5: detained about 10-15 Chinese nationals suspected of extortion.------The arrests took place on the afternoon of December 23
column8: Phnom Penh. ------The Chinese suspects were sent to a specialized office for questioning. The case seems to be centered around a Chinese man who has a Cambodian wife and was kidnapped.------More to come later
